features: 【Chic Clip-On Style, All-Day Comfort】 Weighing just 5.85g, SoundPEATS PearlClip Pro earbuds fit securely and lightly, like delicate pearls on your ears. Made with 70% liquid silicone and memory steel, they adapt to various ear shapes while ensuring durability. The open-ear design keeps you aware of your surroundings, while the ergonomic, breathable fit and sleek look combine style, comfort, and sound quality seamlessly.

【Pure Sound, Open-Ear Freedom】 PearlClip Pro ear clip ear buds delivers exceptional sound quality with 12mm dual-magnetic drivers (PU + nickel-plated diaphragm) and a dynamic EQ algorithm, offering pure, transparent audio and crystal-clear vocals. Its open-ear design with spatial audio effects ensures a comfortable, pressure-free experience, creating a cinema-like atmosphere with immersive, multidirectional sound for movies, music, and podcasts.

【Extended Playtime, Personalized Control】 PearlClip Pro ear buds ensures long-lasting performance with 6-hour single-earbud battery life and up to 24 hours of total playback. With fast charging, just 10 minutes of charge provides 2 hours of listening time. Enjoy uninterrupted music and calls without worry. Supported by the PeatsAudio app, you can customize the EQ settings to suit your audio preferences and easily check battery status, giving you full control over your listening experience.

【Auto-Adaptive Left/Right Channels】 These ear clip earphones offers hassle-free charging with its auto-adaptive left and right channels. No need to worry about which earbud goes where—simply place the earbuds into the charging case in any order, close the lid for 10 seconds, and they automatically adjust to the correct channels. This eliminates confusion, saves time, and ensures a smooth, intuitive user experience, letting you enjoy your music, calls, or work effortlessly without interruptions.

【Face-to-Face Clarity, Anytime, Anywhere】These on-ear clip headphones feature a directional sound design with a precisely aligned input hole that minimizes sound leakage for accurate, high-fidelity audio. The MIC AI noise reduction ensures crystal-clear calls, making conversations as natural as face-to-face interactions. Note: The noise reduction applies only to calls and does not function as active noise cancellation for music or ambient noise.

Previous page Next page 1 12mm Dual Magnetic Driver 2 Dynamic EQ 3 360° Spatial Audio 4 Focused Sound 5 Clear Call Previous page Next page 1 Long-Lasting Battery Life 2 APP Control 3 Advanced Technology 4 Game Mode Perfect Fit, Perfect Sound: Ear Clip Earbuds Subtle Sophistication with Every Listen Pearl-Inspired Ear Clip Design Breaking away from conventional designs, the PearlClip Pro open-ear earbuds draws inspiration from deep-sea pearls, blending natural roundness and luster with modern technology. The pearl’s shine complements the earbud’s sound quality, making every listening session a true feast for the senses. Whether for daily commutes or special occasions, it adds a touch of elegance and brilliance to your style. Versatile Comfort for Every Setting Perfect for commutes, work, and fitness with a secure, comfortable fit Ear clip earbuds offer versatile comfort for various settings. Their secure fit is ideal for commutes, allowing awareness of surroundings. In office and study environments, the subtle design blends in and enables extended, comfortable wear—perfect for focused work and calls. For outdoor enthusiasts, the open-ear style provides ventilation and ambient sound awareness, enhancing safety. Fitness users benefit from a stable fit that stays secure during activities like running and yoga. Multi-Featured Earphones: Elevate Your Audio Experience to the Next Level Previous page Auto-Adaptive Left/Right Channels Auto-Adaptive Left/Right Channels earphones automatically adjust to correct channels when placed in charging case, providing a hassle-free, user-friendly experience. Fast Charging Earphones with 10-min quick charge for 2-hr playback offer customers ultimate convenience, enabling quick top-ups on the go for uninterrupted music/calls. Waterproof Rating The IPX5-rated earphones provide customers with the advantage of withstanding water splashes from any direction, ensuring stable performance in various outdoor or sweaty environments. Next page What Are the Key Tips for Using Ear Clip Headphones? How to Properly Wear Ear Clip Headphones? Incorrect headphone wearing can lead to poor sound quality, discomfort, and reduced stability. Misaligned earbuds may cause sound leakage and fatigue with extended use, while improper adjustments can damage the headphones. To avoid these issues, ensure the ear clips are adjusted to a comfortable angle and the sound outlet is aligned with your ear canal. The video showcases the product in use. How Does the Adaptive Left and Right Channels Work? The adaptive left and right channels can only be completed inside the charging case. When placing the earbuds into the case, there’s no need to distinguish between left and right; just insert them as they are. However, once you remove the earbuds from the case, you must use them according to their designated sides: the one from the left side of the case is for the left ear, and the one from the right side is for the right ear. How to Use the Multi-Point Connection Feature? With multi-point connection, follow these tips to ensure a stable connection and smooth device switching: 1. Minimize Signal Interference: If the earphones are connected to multiple devices simultaneously, signal interference may occur. It’s recommended to turn off the Bluetooth function on any unused devices. 2. Manage Power Consumption: Multi-point connection mode consumes more power than single-point connection. Ensure the earphones and devices are fully charged before use. The video showcases the product in use. The video guides you through product setup. The video compares multiple products. How to Adjust the Tightness of Your Headphones? Adjust the angle of the ear clips as needed. If the ear clip is too tight, gently pinch the ends of the clip, then carefully pull outward to widen the gap. If the ear clip is too loose, gently pinch the ends of the clip, then carefully press inward with a crossing motion to narrow the gap. If the angles of the ear clips on the left and right sides differ significantly, pull outward to widen the gap slightly more. Then, press inward gently with a crossing motion to make the clip smaller. The video showcases the product in use. The video guides you through product setup. The video compares multiple products.
